data.descriptor: Award of Order / Receipt of Order
data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Award_of_Order_Receipt_of_Order
data.news_body:
Ashoka Buildcon Limited informs that the Company had submitted bid in Joint Venture with Aakshya Infra Project Private Limited (Joint Venture) for the project viz. Construction of H.L.R.C.C Bridge over River Gandak with other Major Bridges in approach road between Fatehabad in Paroo block & Chanchaliya in Saraiya Block in the district of Muzzaffarpur on Engineering Procurement & Construction Mode.

Further to apprise that the Joint Venture has received Letter of Acceptance for the said Project.

data.descriptor: Award of Order / Receipt of Order
data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Award_of_Order_Receipt_of_Order
data.news_body:
Ashoka Buildcon Limited informs that its wholly owned subsidiary in Kingdom of Saudi Arabia viz. Ashoka Buildcon Limited for Contracting has informed that it has submitted bid in Joint Venture with BEC Arabia Contracting Co. to Diriyah Company in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia for the project namely Main Construction Works of Diriyah II - Delivery Partner for One Hotel.

The entity awarding the order Diriyah Company Kingdom of Saudi Arabia Public Investment Fund a state owned Sovereign Wealth Fund that invests in domestic and international sectors.

data.caption: Shareholder Meeting / Postal Ballot-Notice of Postal Ballot
data.news_body:
We enclosed herewith a copy of the Postal Ballot Notice dated January 30 2026 of Ashoka Buildcon Limited seeking approval of Members of the Company for the following resolutions.

1. To re-appoint Mr. Ashok Katariya as a Whole-time Director to be designated as Chairman of the Company for a period of three years from April 01 2026 and to obtain approval for the remuneration payable to him on his re-appointment and

2.  To re-appoint Ms. Shilpa Hiran as an Independent Director for 2nd term of 5 consecutive years w.e.f. 01-02-2026.

data.caption:
Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Board Meeting Under Regulations 30 33 & 52 Of SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure
Requirements) Regulations 2015 (Listing Regulations)
data.news_body:
Please be informed that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held today
i.e. January 30 2026 in person at Mumbai inter alia considered and approved the following:
1. The Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results (Limited Review) for the quarter and Nine
months ended December 31 2025 
2. Mr. Ashok Katariya (DIN: 00112240) is re-appointed as a Whole-time Director to be designated as the
Chairman  for a period of 3 years w.e.f. April 01 2026 subject to approval of the shareholders by Postal Ballot.
3. Ms. Shilpa Hiran (DIN: 009045534) is re-appointed as an Independent Director for 2nd term of 5 consecutive
years w.e.f. February 01 2026 subject to approval of the shareholders by Postal Ballot.
4. Postal Ballot Notice for obtaining shareholders approval for re-appointment of Mr. Ashok Katariya and Ms. Shilpa Hiran.

data.descriptor: Award of Order / Receipt of Order
data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Award_of_Order_Receipt_of_Order
data.news_body:
Ashoka Buildcon Limited informs that the Company had submitted bid for the following Project to Public Works Dept - Daman.

Construction of proposed signature bridge connecting Jampore Sea Front road near Light House to Devka Sea Front road at Parkota Sheri at Daman (Project).

Further to apprise that the Company has received Letter of Acceptance for the said Project.

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Notice Of Board Meeting - Regulations 29 33 & 50 Of The SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 [SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015]
data.news_body: Ashoka Buildcon Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 30/01/2026 inter alia to consider and approve the Unaudited standalone and consolidated financial results (Limited Review) of the Company for the quarter ended December 31 2025.

data.caption: Disclosure Under Regulation 30 Of The SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 (SEBI Listing Regulations) - ESG Ratings
data.news_body:
We wish to inform you that SES ESG Research Private Limited (SES ESG) has assigned the ESG Rating of 72.2 to Ashoka Buildcon Limited.

Please note that the Company has not engaged the services of SES ESG for ESG Rating. Rating Agency has independently prepared the report based on data available in public domain.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Credit Rating
data.news_body: Ashoka Buildcon Limited informs the CARE has update the Credit Rating for both long - term and short - term debt of the Company as CARE AA- and CARE A1+ (Reaffirmed Rating Watch with positive implications) respectively.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Issue of Securities
data.news_body: We wish to inform you that the Company has issued Commercial Papers (CPs) (ISIN : INE442H14493) of Rs. 50 Crore on December 30 2025.

data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body: The Company informs that the trading window for dealing in the securities of the Company for all the designated persons and their immediate relatives shall be closed from January 01 2026 till 48 hours after the declaration of financial results of the Company for the quarter ending December 31 2025 to the Exchanges.

data.caption: Issuance Of Securities - Commercial Papers
data.news_body: The Company has issued Commercial Papers (CP) of Rs. 50 Crore on December 23 2025.

data.descriptor: Intimation of Repayment of Commercial Paper (CP)
data.caption: Intimation of Repayment of Commercial Paper (CP)
data.news_body: We hereby inform that the entire redemption amount of Rs. 50 Crore has been paid by the Company on the due date today i.e. December 23 2025 including the interest.

data.caption: Receipt Of Letter Of Acceptance (LOA) For Brihanmumbai Municipal Corporation (BMC) Project
data.news_body: Company informs that M/s. Ashoka-Aakshya JV wherein Company holds 51% being Lead Member and Aakshya holds 49% had submitted bid for: Construction of Flyover connecting J.J. Bridge and Sitraram Selam Bridge (Y Bridge) at J.J. Road and Saboo Siddik Polytechnic Road Junction in "E" Ward has received Letter of Acceptance-cum-Work Order for the Project. Accepted bid price is Rs.1041.44 Crore including GST.

data.caption: Intimation Under Regulation 30 Of SEBI LODR
data.news_body: In continuation to disclosure dtd. 27-11-25 about show cause notice dtd. 26-11-25 issued by NHAI this is to update that Honble New Delhi High Court vide its order dtd. 08-12-25 the copy of which was received on 11-12-25 at 13:30 IST has kept in abeyance Para 4 of the said show cause notice.

data.descriptor: Award of Order / Receipt of Order
data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Award_of_Order_Receipt_of_Order
data.news_body: The Company has received Letter of Acceptance from Brihanmumbai Municipal Corporation for Project bid in Joint Venture

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Credit Rating
data.news_body: We wish to inform you that CRISIL Ratings Limited has assigned and reaffirmed the credit ratings of the Company.

data.descriptor: Award of Order / Receipt of Order
data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Award_of_Order_Receipt_of_Order
data.news_body:
Ashoka Buildcon Limited informs that the Company has received a Letter from Brihanmumbai Municipal Corporation (BMC) awarding scope of work in respect of the existing Project viz. Construction of Flyover Arm-1 Arm-2 at T Junction on Sion Panvel Highway Maharashtra Nagar in M/E Ward (Project).

The Cost of additional scope of work awarded to the Company for the above Project is Rs. 447.21 Crore including taxes.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Updates on Acquisition
data.news_body: The Company has acquired 340000 equity shares of Ashoka Concessions Limited a subsidiary from Investors to make it wholly owned subsidiary. the comapny and Viva Highways Ltd. a subsidiary has also acquired balance CCDs from Investors to give them full exit from Ashoka Concessions Ltd.

data.caption: Intimation Under Reg. 30 Of SEBI LODR
data.news_body: Company is in receipt of letter from NHAI dated 26-11-2025.

data.caption: Updates On Intimation Regarding Sale/Disposal Of Stake Held In Spvs (Defined Below) By Ashoka Concessions Limited A Subsidiary Of The Company Under Regulation 30 Of Securities And Exchange Board Of India (Listing Obligations & Disclosure Requirements) Reg
data.news_body: Ashoka Concessions Limited a material subsidiary of Ashoka Buildcon Limited has with effect from November 26 2025 inter-alia sold its entire share capital held in the SPVs to Maple Infrastructure Trust and its Nominees pursuant to the share purchase agreement and other transaction documents.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Board Meeting
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulations 30 33 and 52 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations & Disclosure Requirements)
Regulations 2015 (SEBI LODR) the outcome of meeting of the Board of Directors held In-Person at
Ashoka House Ashoka Marg Nashik - 422 011 on Friday November 14 2025 which was commenced at
3.45 p.m. and concluded at 5.45 p.m. is as follows.

The Board of Directors has inter alia considered and approved the Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated
Financial Results (Limited Review) for the quarter and half year ended September 30 2025 pursuant to
Regulations 33 and 52 of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 along with statements of Assets & Liabilities
and Cash Flow which have been duly reviewed and recommended by the Audit Committee.

data.caption: Disclosure Of Information Under Reg. 30 Of The SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015
data.news_body: Further to disclosure made on October 02 2024 regarding receipt of LOA for a contract amount of INR 288.18 Crore plus GST for the project viz. Design and construction of Creek Bridge from Kolshet to Kalher awarded by Mumbai Metropolitan Development Authority (MMRDA) this is to inform that pursuant to the decision of its Executive Committee the said project has been cancelled by MMRDA for administrative reasons viz. revised alignment entailing deviations from the GAD shown in the Bid document and the scope of work resulting in alteration of originally sanctioned scope of work.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Intimation
data.news_body: Please find enclosed herewith the Invite of Earnings call - Q2 & FY2026 of the Company to be held on Monday 17 November 2025 at 04:00 pm IST.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Award_of_Order_Receipt_of_Order
data.news_body: The Company has received Letter of Acceptance from the North Western Railway for Ajmer Project at accepted project price of Rs.539.35 Crore incl. GST.

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for To Consider Approve And Take On Record The Unaudited Standalone And Consolidated Financial Results (Limited Review) For The Quarter And Half Year Ended 30/09/2025
data.news_body: Ashoka Buildcon Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 14/11/2025 inter alia to consider and approve Pursuant to Regulations 29 33 and 50(1) of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 Notice is hereby given that a meeting of the Board of Directors of Ashoka Buildcon Limited is scheduled to be held on Friday 14/11/2025 inter alia to consider approve and take on record the unaudited standalone and consolidated (Limited Review) of the Company for the quarter and half year ended 30/09/2025

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Credit Rating
data.news_body: The Company has been assigned ESG score 49 by ESG Risk Assessment & Insights Limited a SEBI Registered ESG Rating provider.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Acquisition
data.news_body: The Company is informed by its 100% subsidiary about the Letter of Intent received by it for Shree Sainath Land & Development India Private Limited as per approval of the Committee of Creditors subject to approval of NCLT.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Credit Rating
data.news_body: We wish to inform you that Crisil ESG Ratings & Analytics Limited (Crisil ESG Ratings) had assigned the ESG Rating to Ashoka Buildcon Limited on October 16 2025 as Below Average.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Acquisition
data.news_body: Pursuant to SPA the Company has today acquired 4457848 Class A Compulsorily Convertible Debentures (CCDs) of Rs. 1007.15 per CCD and 11517129 Class B Compulsorily Convertible Debentures (CCDs) of Rs. 10/- each at consideration of INR 8822548749/-constituting a partial acquisition of the securities held by the Investor in Ashoka Concessions Limited a subsidiary of the Company.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Acquisition
data.news_body: This is to inform that Viva Highways Ltd. a 100% subsidiary of the company has acquired 74620000 equity shares of Rs.10/- each held by SBI Macquarie and SBI Macquarie Infrastructure Trust in Jaora-Nayagaon Toll Road Company Private Limited at consideration of Rs.1665993151/- and thus equity stake of the company in jaora Nayagaon Toll Road company Pvt. Ltd. to 61.17% thru subsidiaries.

data.caption: Intimation Regarding Extension Of Expected Date Of Completion Of Sale/Disposal Of Stake In Subsidiaries Of Ashoka Concessions Limited
data.news_body: Further to the announcement made on July 01 2025 regarding extension of the indicative date for completion of conditions precedent up to September 30 2025 and as mutually agreed with the Proposed Investor the indicative date for completion of the said transaction is extended up to November 20 2025 as transaction is still under process.

data.news_body: Please find attached Scrutinizers Report and Voting Results under Regulation 44 of the SEBI (LODR) Regulation 2015 in respect of the 32nd Annual General Meeting held on September 29 2025 at 12.30 p.m. through VC / OAVM.

data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 57(1) of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 We hereby certify that the Company has made timely payment of Interest in respect of the following Rated Listed Senior Unsecured Redeemable Non-Convertible Debentures (NCD) issued by the Company and listed on the Wholesale Debt Segment of BSE Limited.

data.caption: Updates On Intimation Regarding Sale/Disposal Of Stake Held In Spvs By The Company And Ashoka Concessions Limited
data.news_body: This is to update that the Company and its material subsidiary Ashoka Concessions Limited have sold their respective 100% stake held in shares and securities in 5 SPVs as mentioned in the disclosure attached.

data.caption: Short Closure Of EPC Project In Ivory Coast
data.news_body: The Company and M/s Serneke International Limited have mutually decided to foreclose the Project after considering the terms and conditions of the Contract and progress of the Project. The parties have executed final closure of the Contract agreement on September 19 2025.

data.caption: Intimation Regarding Extension Of Expected Date Of Completion Of Sale/Disposal Of Stake In Subsidiaries Of Ashoka Concessions Limited
data.news_body:
This is in continuation to the announcement made by the Company on October 30 2024 informing about Ashoka Concessions Limited (ACL) a material unlisted subsidiary of the Company entering into of share purchase agreements and other transaction documents (Transaction Documents) with Maple Infrastructure Trust (Proposed Investor) inter alia for sale of the entire share capital held in its following subsidiaries.
1) Ashoka Highways (Bhandara) Limited
2) Ashoka Highways (Durg) Limited
3) Ashoka Belgaum Dharwad Tollway Limited
4) Ashoka Sambalpur Baragarh Tollway Limited 
5) Ashoka Dhankuni Kharagpur Tollway Limited

data.news_body: The Company informs that the trading window for dealing in the securities of the Company for all the designated person and their immediate relatives shall be closed from July 01 2025 till 48 hours after the declaration of financial results of the Company for the quarter ending June 30 2025 to the Exchange.

data.caption: Shareholder Meeting / Postal Ballot-Scrutinizer"s Report
data.news_body: Please find attached herewith Declaration of Result of the Postal Ballot under Regulation 44 of the SEBI (LODR) Regulation 2015.

data.caption: Issuance Of Securities - Commercial Papers
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30  of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 we wish to inform you that the Company has issued Commercial Papers (CPs) of Rs. 50 Crore on June 26 2025.

data.descriptor: Intimation of Repayment of Commercial Paper (CP)
data.caption: Intimation of Repayment of Commercial Paper (CP)
data.news_body: We hereby inform that the entire redemption amount of Rs. 50 Crore has been paid by the Company on the due date today i.e. June 25 2025 including the interest.

data.descriptor: Award of Order / Receipt of Order
data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Award_of_Order_Receipt_of_Order
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 Ashoka Buildcon Limited informs that the Company has received Letter of Acceptance from Government of Guyana Public Works Department dated June 18 2025.

data.caption: Receipt Of Work Orders (Wos) From Motors Vehicles Department Maharashtra For Various Circles
data.news_body: In continuation to the announcement made on June 05 2025 this is to update that the Company received work orders of the same value as disclosed earlier.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Retirement
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 the Company hereby informs that Mr. Vivek V. Kenge SBU Head - Vice President - Power Vertical is retired from the post of SBU Head of the Company effective close the working hours of June 14 2025 as he attained the age of superannuation.

data.caption: Announcement Under Regulation 30 (LODR)
data.news_body: Intimation under Regulation 30 read with Para A of Part A of Schedule III of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (LODR) Regulation 2015.

data.caption: Disclosure Of Information Under Regulation 30 Of The SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015
data.news_body: CIDCO has instructed the Company that no activity of any sort shall be continued or carried out in respect of the Project viz. Integrated Infrastructure Development of 20M & above wide Roads Construction of Various Major & Minor Structures (viz. Flyover Minor Bridges VUPS PUPS etc. ) and Allied Electrical Works (Street Light) in TPS -10 & TPS - 11 under NAINA Project and minor structures  in pursuance of the Order passed by the Honble High Court of Bombay for quashing the referred financial bid.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Credit Rating
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 Ashoka Buildcon Limited would like to inform that the ACUITE Ratings & Research Limited (Acuite) has  the Credit Ratings for both long-term and short-term debt of the Company.

The Acuite has updated the Credit Rating for both long-term and short-term debt of the Company as ACUITE AA (Reaffirmed) and ACUITE A1+(Reaffired) respectively Rating watch with developing implications.

data.caption: Declaration For The Audit Report With Un-Modified Opinion On Annual Audited IND AS Financial Statements For The Financial Year Ended March 31, 2023
data.news_body:
This is with reference to the regulation 33(3)(d) of the SEBI (Listing obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, as amended from time to time. We hereby declare that the statutory auditors of the Company, M/s S R B C & CO. LLP, Chartered Accountants, Mumbai (ICAI Firm Registration No.324982E/E300003) have issued the Audit Report dated May 24, 2023 with unmodified opinion on the Annual Audited Ind AS Financial statements (Standalone & Consolidated) of the Company for the financial year ended March 31, 2023.
The Standalone & Consolidated Financial statements have been reviewed and recommended to the Board of Directors by the Audit Committee and subsequently approved by the Board of Directors at its meeting held on May 24, 2023.

data.caption: Financial Results For Year Ended March 31, 2023
data.news_body:
We enclose herewith the audited standalone and consolidated financial results ('the statements') for the quarter and year ended March 31, 2023, along with Audit Reports issued by M/s SRBC & Co. LLP, statutory auditors of the Company, which have been reviewed and recommended by the Audit Committee and approved and taken on record by the Board of Directors.

This disclosure is pursuant to Reg. 30 and 33 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015.

We would like to further state that M/s SRBC & Co. LLP, statutory auditors of the Company have issued Audit Reports on Standalone and Consolidated Financial Statements with an unmodified opinion.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Board Meeting Under Regulation 30 Of SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 ('Listing Regulations')
data.news_body:
1. The Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results (Limited Review) for the quarter and nine months ended December 31, 2022, along with Limited Review Report
2. Fund Raising proposal by way of issuance of unsecured, rated, listed, redeemable, non-convertible debentures on private placement basis up to Rs.500 Crore, subject to borrowing limits of the company as approved by the shareholders.

The details required under Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 read with SEBI Circular No. ClR/CFD/CMD/4/2015 dated September 09, 2015 is given in Annexure I.
3. Postal Ballot Notice for obtaining shareholders' approval for divestment of entire stake held by the subsidiaries of the Company in Jaora-Nayagaon Toll Road Company Private Limited, a material subsidiary and other step down subsidiaries as per provisions of SEBI LODR 2015 (amended from time to time) and the Companies Act, 2013.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Board Meeting
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015, the outcome of meeting of the Board of Directors held through Video Conferencing at Ashoka House, Ashoka Marg, Nashik - 422 011 on Saturday, February 12, 2022 and the meeting was commenced at 02.30 p.m., concluded at 05:00 p.m. is as follows.

The Board of Directors have considered and approved the Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the quarter and nine months ended December 31, 2021, (Limited Review) pursuant to Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 which have been duly reviewed and recommended by the Audit Committee.

The standalone & consolidated audited financial results will be made available on the Company's website www.ashokabuildcon.com.

data.news_body:

We hereby declare that the statutory auditors of the Company, M/s S R B C & CO. LLP, Chartered Accountants, Mumbai (ICAI Firm Registration No.324982E/E300003) have issued the Audit Report dated June 18, 2021 with unmodified opinion on the Annual Audited Ind AS Financial statements (Standalone & Consolidated) of the Company for the financial year ended March 31, 2021.

The Standalone & Consolidated Financial statements have been reviewed and recommended to the Board of Directors by the Audit Committee and subsequently approved by the Board of Directors at its meeting held on June 18, 2021.

Kindly take the declaration on record.

data.news_body:

3. Appointment of M/s CY & Associates, Cost Accountants, as Cost Auditors for FY 2021-22;
